docs.snippet: Since Mike Rice’s promising career was derailed by the highlight reel from hell, there’s nothing he won’t do to prove he can get his competitive fire under control....
docs.lead_paragraph: Since Mike Rice’s promising career was derailed by the highlight reel from hell, there’s nothing he won’t do to prove he can get his competitive fire under control.
docs.abstract: Mike Rice, former head coach for Rutgers University men's basketball team, is doing everything he can to prove he can control his competitive nature; Rice is running after-school clinics for third-to-sixth graders, large step down from being head coach of a university team, after being fired for mistreating his players.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
